Игра интересна своими головоломками, механиками, юмором и "главным злодеем", если будете играть, лучше играть с оригинальной озвучкой, а не русской т.к., на мой взгляд, она корявая. В конце игры вы поймёт фразу "The cake is a lie" или в простонародье "Торт - это ложь".
Portal is a masterpiece. The game only takes about 3 hours to finish, but it still is a great experience and a must play.

I love this game ,I did a normal run and I did a speed run of this game ,I my speed run was slow but I got a lot of views of it and I was happy about it ,portal 1 is a great introduction to the portal series ,just talking about it makes me want to play it and speed run it again 
If you have never played this game ,play it now ,you are missing out

进度：无卡游戏，已通关，已体验大部分内容。

Awesome game
Bro cake

This game is split in 3 parts on which I have very different opinions, so 1 will review each one separately.

1.Half
This is by far the best part of the game. The puzzles are creative and never unfair, although it takes a while to get going, since the first few levels are mainly there to teach the player the mechanics that honestly do not need such a long introduction. But once you acquire the full portal gun the game get really fun. 
The minimal story is quite funny and suspenseful with a good twist at the end.

2.Half
Unfortunately this part is a severe drop in quality. The main difficulty of the “puzzles“ is to find the surface you have to shoot a portal on or doing some easy jumps. This means that the game is too easy except when you can not find where to progress, wich is more frustrating than fun.
The story gets a bit stale but is still humorous.
Overall this part is boring and the game would be better without it.

Final Boss
This part of the game is ok. The boss is fun but too easy, with an unnecessary timer, that at least is very long so the chance of failure is low.
This part mainly succeeds as a finale to the story.
Amazing game, timeless
i can see why people love this game now

FIX TF2
Portal is just a flat-out great game, especially if you like a little puzzle solving.

Portal was a childhood favorite of mine. Puzzle games have always been fun to me but Portal goes above and beyond in its world-building and awesome dialogue. It has aged very well and I had a lot of fun replaying both games. It really is better going in blind if you've managed to avoid spoilers for this iconic game. Valve is the industry standard for quality games and interesting new tech and mechanics, their reputation is well-earned. Play Portal, play Half-Life, and just be wowed at incredible game design.
is good
Very funny, clever puzzles, good physics, companion cube, good pacing, a classic, spawned many good fan-games and official games, good post-game activities, good replay value, and the cake was good.

This is probably,  in pair with Portal 2 the most ingenious mind blowing game ever made.  There are other games out there that impress, and I have played games for many, many years, but I have never come across anything as clean, simple and intelligent as the Portal games. If  you like pussles, this is simply as good as it gets!

The classic and incredible start to the Portal™ series. Though it might not be as complex as the sequel it's definitely got it's own charm with it being this old. Level design is very simple yet effective and it's clear that none had yet seen the full potential of this puzzle element. Highly recommend this series as it's often cheap and a good experience, funny jokes and not something you're likely to forget.
